headline: Fixing the mixed content problem with Automatic HTTPS Rewrites

description: Long ago it was difficult, expensive, and slow to set up an HTTPS capable web site. Then along came services like CloudFlareâ€™s Universal SSL that made switching from http:// to https:// as easy as clicking a button.
